sopt_l1_rwparam Struct Reference

#include <sopt_l1.h>

Data Fields

int verbose

Detailed Description

Data structure containing the parameters for solving the reweighted l1 optimisation problem.

Definition at line 74 of file sopt_l1.h.

Field Documentation

int sopt_l1_rwparam::init_sol

Flag to define a valid initial solution: 0 the solution in xsol is not valid and it will run the l1 solver with unitary weights to find the initial solution. 1 takes xsol as the initial solution (warm start).

Definition at line 89 of file sopt_l1.h.

Referenced by main(), sopt_l1_rwmin(), and sopt_l1_rwsdmm().

int sopt_l1_rwparam::max_iter

Maximum number of iterations for the global RW-L1 problem.

double sopt_l1_rwparam::rel_var

Convergence criteria. Minimum relative variation in the solution.

double sopt_l1_rwparam::sigma

Noise standard deviation in the representation domain.

int sopt_l1_rwparam::verbose

Verbose flag: 0 no log, 1 a summary at convergence, 2 print main steps (default: 1).
